snippet.title: Anomaly Agent - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready for an action-packed adventure in Anomaly Agent! 📆🔜  

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2378620/Anomaly_Agent/

🥊 Use your special anomaly weapons to throw your opponents. Beat them with your close combat techniques or shoot 'em up!
🤸‍♀️ Evade your pursuing enemies with acrobatic movements.
🔫 Change your gameplay by developing your character in different styles.
👉 Shape the course of events. Make the world a safe place... or drag it towards disaster. The choice is yours. 👀

⬇ Follow Anomaly Agent on social media

🌃 Twitter: https://twitter.com/phewphewgames
📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/phewphewgames/
🎬 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@phewphewgames

#games #indie #anomalyagent
